channel.title: Learning on Adam's Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Adam's Analysis

item.title: Senior Project Inspiration
item.description: Introduction My dad is a wise man. Ever since I switched my degree from accounting to data science in the summer of 2020, he has put the bug in my ear to make some kind of program that can predict how many cinnamon rolls that one of my mom’s bakeries should make. I’ve thought that this is a great idea! However, I have not really known how to execute on this idea until a few months ago.
